item.title: The story of Covid-19 vaccination appointments in India
yarc - for the laziness in you
item.description: So, the other day I sat down watching The Matrix. It’s comfortable and relaxing; everything’s going great. The universal law of Conservation of Coziness comes to bite you! If you are a realist, you can relate. Being comfortable for long is not possible. The longer you remain relaxed, the more you’ll have to work your ass off later. Okay, now going back to the story. I was relaxing and enjoying the great movie.
